about_the_game:
Our protagonist is the only male to exhibit control over spirit energy; the power Demon Slayers use to fight against supernatural forces. He is enrolled in a secret academy to harness his powers.

Of course, the main benefit to this is he is surrounded by sexy ladies, from the MILF head mistress to the stacked female trainees. During a training session, while watching their boobs bounce, hips sway and asses strain against their anti-demon dresses, his libido reaches a new high and his hidden power finally awakens!

What better place to use as a testing ground for a nearly limitless power, which uses lust as a fuel source, than a place full of hot babes? Freeze time to grope the feisty tomboy's tits, magically-tattoo a climax counter on the stoic chick for everyone to see, turn she shy healer girl into a horny little meat toilet by making her wet every time she uses her powers.

Best of all, once you've enraptured the strongest Demon Hunters with your powers, head out and become a real Sexorcist and start adding some sexy monster girls to your devoted harem!!


  • Translated version of the original Japanese Visual Novel
  • Your whole harem is fully voiced with original Japanese dialogue
  • Original artwork HD upscaled with 16:9 and 4:3 variants
  • Hours of story content
  • Audio including music and special effects
  • Enhanced with character sprite animations
  • Gallery and Scene selections
  • 24 scenes of using mind-bending powers to make your erotic fantasies a reality!

Sexorcism Academy Is the English localization of a Visual Novel originally created by prolific Japanese developer Miel. We at Cherry Kiss aim to provide an authentic Japanese Visual Novel experience to gamers outside of Japan.

**PLEASE NOTE**
All characters described and visually represented in this game are over 18 years of age, and no actual, nor identifiable minor was used in the production of this game.

highlighted.name: Look at me, I'm the Master now.
Don't you know, I'm world famous!

content_descriptors.notes:
- Large portions of the game include nudity and graphic descriptions of sexual activities that feature female domination.
- There are scenes of sexual intercourse involving pregnant characters.
- Some scenes include characters being coerced into sexual acts or engaging in sexual acts with dubious consent.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.6+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Sexorcist Academy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound

short_description: Surrounded by sexy ladies 24/7, overflowing lust awakens the ultimate power! Demons and Demon Slayers alike succumb to your powers as you bend time and space to create the perfect harem of a MILF-y headmistress, a busty fox demon, and all the stacked trainees you can get your hands on!
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
